title: Vehicle Safety Essentials
description: Essential safety checks and maintenance tasks for your car to reduce accident risks and ensure optimal performance.

tasks.title: Check tire pressure and tread depth monthly
tasks.description: Proper tire maintenance prevents blowouts and improves fuel efficiency

tasks.title: Test brakes and brake fluid levels
tasks.description: Ensure braking system is functioning properly

tasks.title: Verify all lights are working
tasks.description: Check headlights, taillights, indicators, and hazard lights

tasks.title: Keep emergency kit in car
tasks.description: Include first aid, flashlight, jumper cables, and basic tools

tasks.title: Update vehicle registration and insurance documents
tasks.description: Ensure all documents are current and easily accessible

title: Two-Wheeler Safety Protocol
description: Critical safety measures for motorcycle and scooter riders to minimize road accident risks.

tasks.title: Always wear ISI certified helmet
tasks.description: Properly fitted helmet reduces head injury risk by 70%

tasks.title: Check brake functionality before every ride
tasks.description: Test both front and rear brakes for proper response

tasks.title: Inspect chain tension and lubrication
tasks.description: Proper chain maintenance prevents mechanical failures

tasks.title: Wear reflective clothing during night rides
tasks.description: Increase visibility to other road users

title: Home Security & Safety
description: Comprehensive home protection measures to prevent burglary, fire, and other household risks.

tasks.title: Install and test smoke detectors
tasks.description: Check batteries monthly and replace detectors every 10 years

tasks.title: Secure all entry points with quality locks
tasks.description: Use deadbolts and consider smart locks for enhanced security

tasks.title: Check electrical wiring and outlets
tasks.description: Look for frayed wires, sparks, or frequent circuit breaker trips

tasks.title: Install motion sensor lights outdoors
tasks.description: Deter intruders and improve nighttime safety

tasks.title: Create and practice emergency evacuation plan
tasks.description: Ensure all family members know escape routes

tasks.title: Service HVAC system annually
tasks.description: Prevent carbon monoxide leaks and maintain air quality

title: Electronic Device Protection
description: Safeguard your gadgets and electronics from damage, theft, and data loss.

tasks.title: Enable screen lock and biometric security
tasks.description: Protect device access with PIN, password, or fingerprint

tasks.title: Install antivirus software
tasks.description: Protect against malware and suspicious apps

tasks.title: Use protective case and screen protector
tasks.description: Prevent physical damage from drops and scratches

tasks.title: Enable automatic cloud backup
tasks.description: Protect important data and photos from device loss

tasks.title: Register device serial numbers
tasks.description: Keep records for insurance and theft recovery purposes

title: Personal Health & Wellness
description: Preventive health measures and wellness practices to maintain good health and reduce medical risks.

tasks.title: Schedule annual health checkup
tasks.description: Early detection of health issues through regular screening

tasks.title: Maintain updated vaccination records
tasks.description: Stay current with recommended immunizations

tasks.title: Exercise regularly - 150 minutes per week
tasks.description: Maintain cardiovascular health and prevent chronic diseases

tasks.title: Maintain healthy diet with balanced nutrition
tasks.description: Focus on fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains

tasks.title: Practice stress management techniques
tasks.description: Use meditation, yoga, or other relaxation methods

tasks.title: Get adequate sleep - 7-9 hours nightly
tasks.description: Maintain consistent sleep schedule for optimal health
